title: Badshah Responds To Dr Zeus On 'Don't Be Shy' Controversy, Says He’s ‘Right To Get Angry With Me'
text:
Badshah Responds To Dr Zeus On 'Don't Be Shy' Controversy, Says He’s ‘Right To Get Angry With Me'

Badshah Responds To Dr Zeus On 'Don't Be Shy' Controversy, Says He’s ‘Right To Get Angry With Me'

The trend of remixed has clearly taken over Bollywood with every movie having at lest one old song in new packaging. The audiences haven’t been really happy with Bollywood’s lack of creativity and originality, but all seemed fine until the makers of original song didn’t have a problem, right?

But looks like Dr Zeus who composed the blockbuster song Don’t Be Shy has been rubbed the wrong way. After the remix version of the song was released, he slammed the makers on Twitter and even said that he would take a legal action against them.

YouTube

He was clearly not happy.

Are u guys taking the piss @sonymusicindia @MaddockFilms @Its_Badshah @SonyMusicUK @SachinJigarLive wen did u compose don’t b shy & kangna.. more to the point how dare u guys b riding off ma old hits & fuckin them up??? Ya need to get original🖕🏽My lawyers will b in touch🖕🏽 — Dr Zeus (@drzeusworld) October 18, 2019

Responding to the allegations, Badshah finally, in a statement on Instagram, said that Dr Zeus has all the right to get angry with him.

Don't Miss 382 SHARES 634 SHARES 2.7 K SHARES 1.1 K SHARES

Here’s what he wrote.

“I am aware of the situation around Dont be shy’. I want to start by saying that i love And respect @drzeusworld paaji immensely and he knows it. He has the right to get angry with me because he’s my senior and ive learnt a lot from him. And he is the last person id want to go through something like this. I got on the song, which has been recreated by my dear friends Sachin Jigar, only after making sure we had the necessary rights. But still if there’s any misunderstanding, ill make sure it gets cleared asap. I support Zeus Paaji.”

Dr Zeus then confirmed that he had a telephonic conversation with Badshah and said that he has been his fan too. However, he was still upset with the music label, he wrote.

“Big respect to @Its_Badshah for actually having the courtesy of pickin up the fone & addressing me about this don’t b shy situation.. I no issues with u bro ya ma fam & always will be. As for @sonymusicindia it’s not bout last min credits!!! that are still totally wrong!!"

Big respect to @Its_Badshah for actually having the courtesy of pickin up the fone & addressing me about this don’t b shy situation.. I no issues with u bro👊🏼 ya ma fam & always will be. As for @sonymusicindia it’s not bout last min credits!!! that are still totally wrong!! — Dr Zeus (@drzeusworld) October 18, 2019
